name: Controlled useState
description: Demonstration of controlled vs uncontrolled components with form toggle using useState and useRef hooks
approach: Uses React's useState hook for controlled form state and useRef hook for uncontrolled form access. Demonstrates both paradigms with a toggle switch and unified submit handler.
features: Toggle between controlled and uncontrolled modes
Radio button selection for form mode
Same form inputs in both modes
Console logging in consistent format with mode indicator
Different form clearing methods for each mode
Bootstrap form styling with responsive design
Unified submit handler for both modes
